attributes.action: I would like you to cancel 2021 A level exams & asses us another appropriate way
attributes.additional_details: I would like you to make this change as I think it is simply unfair that we are unable to access to quality teaching during this time & are expected to complete an exam when we have taught ourself half the curriculum & do not have the knowledge & understanding I need despite the teachers who are working tirelessly to try & provide the support for us. Not only this but these Zoom sessions we have to do are limited to 40 mins per meeting & I am not getting the full lesson time I am entitled to.
attributes.background:
I would like you to remove the idea of exams 
& do assessments or coursework simply for the year 12s who have to teach themselves. I will not be able to be supported to the extent I need to be during this time to ensure that I have a deep understanding & developed knowledge.
